rev.comment: /* Responses to criticism */ Date formatting (no ordinals in dates); Copy edit sentence so that
removed [[Category:People from Andhra Pradesh]]; added [[Category:People from Anantapur district]] using [[WP:HC|HotCat]]
/* Illness and death reactions */ more sachin and 1 crackpot who does nothign for the world
New image added to the infobox, from commons. (The summary of the image was translated to english)
/* Late years, death and reactions */ 2nd apra is not relevant t o his death, and need cites for others (although sachin was known today)
/* Reputation for miracles and clairvoyance */ paring it back because this is a primary source
/* Early life and proclamation */ Sathyanarayana Raju
This section has the first important proclamation
/* Reputation for miracles and clairvoyance */ Removed academic title as per style policy.
/* Later activities and establishments */ More NPOV.
switch url from Google Books to publisher's site. Tag as self published source.

Undid revision 425680481 by [[Special:Contributions/Redtigerxyz|Redtigerxyz]] ([[User talk:Redtigerxyz|talk]]) POV "truth" assertion.
"popular" is subjective also was very controversial
/* Later activities and establishments */ complete description
/* Late years, death and reaction */ Style edits.
/* Miracles and clairvoyance */ explain why Premanand's view is relevant
/* Saintship */ Heading - information does not indicate "saintship" (and the correct word is "sainthood").
/* Criticism and controversy */ undone previous edit: relevant sections moved to miracles
/* Criticism and controversy */ restore referened criticism section, which was white washed
/* Biography */ please follow [[WP:BLP]]. subheadings are important
/* Criticism and controversy */ "the" is not needed, here.
/* Ashrams and mandirs */ get the {{Main}} with the rest of the text
/* Illness, death and reaction */ see [[WP:WEASEL]], also we need a source for these
/* Miracles and clairvoyance */ quote (I have found a copy of the source and he appears to be talking about this criticism)
/* Responses to criticism */ this can go up a section too
/* Responses to criticism */ ok it was misquoted, correct
/* Responses to criticism */ that quote does not seem to be in the source (there is also no context for it ..)
/* Miracles and clairvoyance */ moved up, also tweak wording to attribute this as the view of the documentaries (avoiding WP;s voice)
/* Criticism and controversy */ this can be moved up as well
/* Criticism and controversy */ this rebuttal relates directly to this documentary, so lets put them side by side
this all relates to the miracles, so can go in that section
/* Criticism and controversy */ Everything here appears to be referenced, there are no inline tags which dispute factual accuracy, and no talk discussion. removed {{Disputed}}
/* Criticism and controversy */ There is no discussion on the talk page about POV issues, and no inline tags. Removed POV tag.
